QuestData.Title: The Bitter End
QuestData.Description:
It just happened. I--He was sleeping and I looked away and-- We came back here every day, he just wanted to sit with the whelps, I didn't know he--
<Kolgar's face is clearly tear-stained. He rubs his eyes with the back of his hand.>
No, I knew. I knew. But I don't know what to do now. What do I do with him?
Can you-- Can you find Bathoras?
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Bathoras to Duroz and Kolgar.
